portfolio.title: Jupit - Travel Planner
portfolio.description: Virtual travel assistant easily connecting travellers to Airbnb lodging, Eventbrite local events, and Google Flight fares in one easy search. Made with Meteor.js.

portfolio.title: Miami Budget
portfolio.description: D3 visualization of Miami Dade County's 2016 budget proposal from Miami's open data portal. Made in collaboration with Code for Miami.

portfolio.title: Best Damn Me Tracker
portfolio.description: Mobile web app that lets you track anything and learn from the patterns of your behavior. Uses Angular 2, ngrx, RxJS, and Firebase.

companies.title: Biznobo
companies.description: As this startup's first hire, we used RxJS, microservices, Firebase, and a React-like frontend to help business owners track user's across platforms and automate personalize marketing, leveraing 3rd party APIs like Mailchimp and KeenIO.

companies.title: PeopleTicker
companies.description: This job rate search engine crunched compensation rates based on the job description, the candidate's experience, and the location of the company. I developed a real-time data pipeline of job postings using Python and Apache Solr, and the job rate engine using Java.

companies.title: Walt Disney Parks
companies.description: As a junior dev on the team that launched Disney's brand-new web experience, my team integrated all other services and I participated in making developer tools such as service heartbeat monitors, easy environment config switching, and data manipulating Python scripts.
